@mzk57: Thanks.
Your suggestion is generally not bad, but I don't "tag" my torrents, I do tagging to my encodes. 
Also,  for years (and all people who really appreciate my work) have read 9th and tenth line.
Further, if anyone need to do TPB search for my "home-page" or torrent, could do simple

+480p
or
+h264
as for example
castle+480p

but it is bad idea since I started doing TV and Movie Packs.
So, my first advice is the best one.
